description: two seated nudes at center, in a landscape; putto at LRC; two dogs at LLC; drapery at right behind figures and drapery study at top
markings: on verso, bottom center: rooster stamp (Lugt 2811b)
medium: Pen and brown ink and wash, black chalk and gray wash
provenance: Carl Robert Rudolf, Lugt 2811b (1884-1974) London; Prof. Moir, Santa Barbara (until 2009; given to MIA)
title: Venus and Adonis
